resources.string:
KURO CORPORATIONS
 July 21st, 2042
 TT/00042/CT13425253
 
 PROJECT WIRED
 
 Briefing:
 - .pkk files have been provided for convenient access to locked files.
 - Subject H is located around the core area.
 - Once the virtual wall is breached, Subject H could possibly take advantage of the breach.
 
 Main Objective:
 - Investigate the cause of The Incident.
 - Prevent Subject H from leaving the core.

ACCESS TO LOCKED FOLDER: SHELL
 
 Folder key is required for access.
 Any unauthorized breach would result in severe consequences.

SHELL 1: SUBJECTS
 March 4th, 2004
 TT/00001/SB164872641
 
 Greetings Director Mayer,
 The following recruits for the project have been gathered:
 First Subject: Initial SM
 Second Subject: Initial TH
 Third Subject: Initial RK
 Fourth Subject: Initial WD
 Fifth Subject: Initial HS
 Necessary details are attached for your convenience.
 
 With regards,
 Dr. Hiroto Takahashi

"TRANSCRIPT WITH ▇▇▇▇"
 "September 15th, ▇▇▇▇"
 "TT/▇▇▇▇/▇▇▇▇▇▇▇▇"
 
 "Doctor: Hello, ▇▇▇▇. How are you feeling today?"
 "▇▇▇▇: …"
 "Doctor: Not going to answer? Okay… Let's check your temperature first."
 "▇▇▇▇: …"
 "Doctor: …Why are you staring at me, ▇▇▇▇?"
 "▇▇▇▇: …Cold."
 "Doctor: What?"
 "▇▇▇▇: I feel… Cold."
 "Doctor: Oh… Sorry for that. I will turn off the air conditioner real quick-"
 "▇▇▇▇: No, leave it on, please…"
 "Doctor: …But you just said that you feel cold?"
 "▇▇▇▇: Yes… It's cold."
 "Doctor: Then why don't you want to turn off the air conditioner?"
 "▇▇▇▇: Because it… just is. It's cold. There is no need to change that."

When I am near you, I feel calm and secure…
 
 If this is unreal, then I don't want to be real.
 
 Let me indulge in this storm while we are together.
 
 Shizuka

"TRANSCRIPT WITH SUBJECT 1"
 "August 21st, ▇▇▇▇"
 "TT/34577/SB23474525723"
 
 "Doctor: So, Mrs. Shizuka?"
 "Shizu: Shizu is fine."
 "Doctor: Thank you for clarifying that."
 "Doctor: Do you understand what is this project about?"
 "Shizu: I have read the description in the letter that you sent to me."
 "Doctor: Well, isn't that relieving."
 "Shizu: So, when can we start with the procedure?"
 "Doctor: Anytime you are ready, Mrs. Shizu."
 "Shizu: Can we start now?"
 "Doctor: However, do note that once the proce-"
 "Shizu: I trust you, Doctor. Please proceed with what you need to do."
 "Doctor: …"
Never ever leave me…\n \n A happy illusion, with him.
It\'s full of happiness here…\n \n Why won\'t you join us?
Huh…\n \n Love is all that matters…
You just won\'t understand…\n \n Leave us alone.

If I can't move my own body anymore,
 Then what the fuck am I?
 Let me do what I want…

"TRANSCRIPT WITH SUBJECT 2"
 "November 5th, ▇▇▇▇"
 "TT/42317/SB25241613461"
 
 "Thurnbraum: I have read the letter, doc."
 "Doctor: So you understand what this project is all about, right?"
 "Thurnbraum: More than understand, I could confirm that."
 "Doctor: Do note that once the procedure is done, the you as per now won't exist anymore."
 "Thurnbraum: I have no affection towards myself right now."
 "Thurnbraum: If this means that I can dance again, so be it."
 "Doctor: If that is really what you want…"
 "Thurnbraum: Could you help me to open the door, please? My wheelchair is stuck."
 "Doctor: …"
 "Thurnbraum: … Oi, doc."
 "Doctor: …Yes?"
 "Thurnbraum: Thank you."
That feeling of \n \n A happy illusion, with him.
